## Problem 1 (50pt)

Suppose that the daily log return of a pair of securities follows the following model:

$$
\left\{\begin{array}{l}
r_{1, t}=-0.05+0.1 r_{1, t-1}+0.05 r_{2, t-1}+a_{1, t} \\
r_{2, t}=0.1-0.1 r_{1, t-1}+0.3 r_{2, t-1}+a_{2, t}
\end{array}\right.
$$
